Articles.Content:
Long time lurker, first time poster. I've been playing for around 6 months but have owned the game much longer (damn you steam sales). Following my rocket phase I fell heavily in love with the trial and error of flying SSTOs and eventually SSTAs. My latest creation has got me from Kerbin to Moho (with a number of stops in between). I hope you like the story and that anyone trying the same can learn a bit from my experience.

 

Album https://imgur.com/a/TthxdGN will appear when post is submitted
I'm getting the "Zoinks! You've taken a wrong turn." page from the imgur link.
